description: [``botocore``] Adding support for r6gd instances for MemoryDB Redis with data tiering. In a cluster with data tiering enabled, when available memory capacity is exhausted, the least recently used data is automatically tiered to solid state drives for cost-effective capacity scaling with minimal performance impact.
[``botocore``] Amazon SageMaker now supports running training jobs on ml.trn1 instance types.
[``botocore``] Update endpoint-rules client to latest version
